review:
Sure! Here's a review for a doctor dentist:

---

I recently had the pleasure of visiting Dr. Sudershan Ramachandran for a routine check-up 

 and I couldn't be more impressed with the level of care and professionalism I received. From the moment I walked into the office, I was greeted by a friendly and attentive staff who made me feel welcome and comfortable.

Dr. Sudershan R is exceptionally skilled and *************, taking the time to explain each step of the process and answer all of my questions. Their gentle approach and attention to detail made the entire experience painless and stress-free. I particularly appreciated the modern equipment and techniques used, which ensured a thorough and efficient treatment.

The office itself is clean, well-organized, and equipped with the latest technology, which further enhanced my confidence in the quality of care provided. Dr. Sudershan genuine concern for their patients' well-being is evident, and I left feeling more informed about my dental health and confident in the care I received.

I highly recommend Dr. Sudershan to anyone in need of dental services. Their expertise, compassionate approach, and commitment to patient satisfaction make them an outstanding choice for dental care.

review:
Patience. Listening to the issue carefully. 
Suggesting and explaining the course of action so its easily understood. 
Rapid action on the plan.
Reviewing and sharing results clearly. 
Advise on medication and care.
Follow up advise , only if required. 
Superb attention and treatment .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to Dr Sudarshan to get 4 dental implants on the upper and lower jaw on the right hand side. I already had 3 or 4 implants from another doctor who had done a good job. I decided to switch my doctor to Sudarshan because i had gone to him for other things and liked him. I have to say that Dr Sudarshan did an excellent job in many ways. 1. I communicated that pain management was very important to me. He was very good in handling this made sure that in a surgery like putting in implants he paid enough attention that the pain factor during surgery was minimal (remember they drill into the jawbone when this is done) 2. Great post op instructions and response on whatsapp for any doubts 3. Because of the instructions given i was able to manage post op pain and had very little swelling despite an intense procedure and had stiches removed within 4 working days 4. My previous dentist while being good was twice as expensive as Dr Sudarshan for a procedure like implants. Very happy overall. Will recommend him without qualification.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
This doctor is not just a second-generation dentist but also an excellent diagnostician.  My peculiar problem with shooting pain near the jaw-joint was diagnosed by him with just a few pertinent questions.  He was also forthcoming in telling me that it was more of an ENT problem than a dental problem.  Amidst the trend of doctors prescribing superfluous tests and causing confusion, this doctor's honest approach was very refreshing.  

It was clear on my very first visit that integrity and patient care are the most important values for Dr. Sudharshan.  God bless him.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
1. Awesome Punctuality. The clock struck 5 pm when the doctor arrived. 
2. Absolute effective use of time 
3. No unnecessary recommendations of additional tests to be done 
4. Understood patients needs well 
5. Extremely professional 
6. Extremely comfortable post treatment
7. No pain at all post treatment 
8. Pleasant experience considering doctors of these days 
9. No unnecessary hype or caution which makes you wonder what would happen in future 
10. Well trained staff at the clinic - know when and how to do their job 
Overall experience was WOW!!!

tags: None
review:
The experience was excellent. I had a wisdom tooth impinging into a molar tooth. He was prompt and decisive with his diagnosis. We had a tooth extraction surgery planned for the following day and the procedure was done very well and was well explained. The surgeon did the procedure in a calm manner and explained the process throughout the extraction. 

The follow ups were really easy , Dr Sudarshan was available to help on sms when necessary. I went back in a week and I had my stitches removed. The overall experience was extremely smooth and put me at ease throughout. 

I highly recommend Dr Sudarshan.

review: Experience has been very comfortable right from beginning till end.In fact I came with an intention to remove the tooth.I am thankful to Dr for advising me to save  the  tooth .As suggested by Dr I Have agreed for root  canal of the  defective tooth and  also for gum treatnent.First  day itself got relief of 80% after root canal of the  tooth.

review: Doctor explained the process very patiently and was willing to answer any additional questions I had. Everything is fine post treatment and i hope it continues during my future appointments.

He has asked me to come again for further biopsy.
